title: Vietnam: Britain sent papers for 4 truck dead for checks
text:
FILE PHOTO: Flowers are seen at the scene where bodies were discovered in a lorry container, in Grays, Essex, Britain October 24, 2019. REUTERS/Simon Dawson

BANGKOK (Reuters) - Britain has sent documents to Vietnam for checks on four of the 39 people found dead in a truck outside London last week, Vietnam’s government said on Monday.

The government website said that Deputy Foreign Minister Bui Thanh Son had told reporters the dossiers had been given to Vietnam’s Ministry of Public Security for “verification coordination”.

“The Ministry of Foreign Affairs is developing dossiers of possible victims but until now there have been no grounds to confirm Vietnamese nationals are among the victims,” it quoted Son as saying.
description: Britain has sent documents to Vietnam for checks on four of the 39 people found dead in a truck outside London last week, Vietnam's government said on Monday.
